Posts.Content: C4, Karin, Steven, Spitfire. I have pain but because of all the up and down talk about steroids, and they may be these be banned in the future. I elected to stay off opioids, I elected to not get them. I am allergic to all medications doctors have put me on. also, gluten, histamine releasing foods, acidic foods, joint inflammation foods, etc. a long list when you add all up. I cannot take even aspirin or Ibporforn. so, what can I do to cut cost and pain level? I had acupuncture but don't last long, the treatments that are used. I studied a Japanese procedure called Shiatsu. another called pressure therapy. I bought books, studied them then uses them on pains areas. also, use cold or heat pacs. you can find books online or at used items stores, etc. for most things there is a way ought though sometimes it takes years to find out. hugs, love, grandpa Walt.
Posts.Title: New column: "The Little Voice in my Head – Escaping My Biggest Enemy"

Posts.Content: when threatened with a fine or losing your license if a rule is violated, of course, the caregiver is worried because of not enough profit figured in the billing to cover the cost of fines plus the loss of businesses. hugs, grandpa Walt
Posts.Title: New column: "The Little Voice in my Head – Escaping My Biggest Enemy"

Posts.Content: John, I learned caregiving by doing, and ended up finishing caregiving when Wife passed may 8 2017. I now have a caregiver for me 4 evenings a week. I have many answers that I learned should any new caregivers want some questions answered about caregiving for dementia. my psoriasis seems to be controlled by eliminating many foods since allergic to medications. I am semi homebound, about half the time. not legally by their book. canes, walker, rollator, wheelchair. it depends on how much ground must cover wherever I stop. hugs, grandpa Walt
Posts.Title: New column: "The Little Voice in my Head – Escaping My Biggest Enemy"

Posts.Content: Thisishard, would you be at ease if someone started a post titled 'Our ramblings' and all these post be posted there? just teasing my friend. have a great day. hugs, grandpa Walt
Posts.Title: New column: "The Little Voice in my Head – Escaping My Biggest Enemy"
